reviewText: Bad quality. It's not a DVD, but a DVD-R!
This item had more minutes devoted to chesterfield cigarettes than Perry's singing.
JUST THE BEST......LONG TIME FAN..50  years....pix quality ruff..but fun to  see PERRY
Really enjoyed the Perry Como Collection DVD, as it was of good quality and brought back great memories to share !
Disc quality excellent...Content was Fair.  Too many commercials.  Thought there would be more of Perry  That's why I purchased it.
The videos where so bad of quality. Shouldn't of been up for sale. Must of been a cheap very used knock off.
Any time Perry Sings..is Wonderful!!! What a brilliant Artist!!! They don't Sing like him..anymore!!! What a pleasure to have the videos and cd's!!!

If you read the editorial review carefully, you see that the DVD has only 7 of the over 100 perry Como shows he did.
As i said not worth the price
